title: Are we going to get penalised for these DC's?
body: Simple, there's plenty of problems with some people with certain ISP's, me being one of them (with Iprimus) and with the way players are these days, if they get a lose due to a DC most report them and it generally results in a ban. There's not much us as the players can really do. Will we get punished for the inconvenience?

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you continue to DC from games, the automated leaverbuster system will still punish you.

>There's not much us as the players can really do. Will we get punished for the inconvenience?

Your best bet is to wait it out and simply not play, try every so often in a CUSTOM game to see if the issues are resolved.

I also recommend contacting your ISP to discuss the issue with them.
